message.voicechat.incompatible_version:
§cYour voice chat client version is not compatible with the server-side version.
Please install version %s of %s.
message.voicechat.incompatible: §cYour voice chat client version is not compatible with the server-side version.
message.voicechat.group_type.normal.desc: Players who are not in your group §c§ncan't hear you§r, but §a§nyou can hear them§r.
message.voicechat.group_type.open.descri: Players who are not in your group can hear you, and you can hear them too.
message.voicechat.group_type.isolated.de: Players who are not in your group can't hear you, and you can't hear them either.
message.voicechat.macos_no_mic_permissio: §cNo permission to access your microphone. Please open System Settings > Privacy & Security and check the access options there
message.voicechat.macos_unsupported_laun: §cYour launcher does not support macOS microphone permissions
message.voicechat.mute.disabled_ptt: §cYou can't mute your microphone when using push to talk.
message.voicechat.hide_icons.enabled: Press to §ashow§r all voice chat icons.
message.voicechat.hide_icons.disabled: Press to §chide§r all voice chat icons.
message.voicechat.show_group_hud.enabled: Press to §chide§r the group chat HUD.
message.voicechat.show_group_hud.disable: Press to §ashow§r the group chat HUD.
message.voicechat.no_speak_permission: §cYou do not have permission to speak
message.voicechat.no_listen_permission: §cYou do not have permission to hear the voice chat
message.voicechat.no_group_permission: §cYou do not have permission to join groups
message.voicechat.search_empty: §cCouldn't find any players with that name
message.voicechat.other_volume.descripti: §fThe volume of any sound not listed below.
message.voicechat.onboarding.introductio:
§fThis setup guide will help you configure your voice chat.

You can skip it if you know what you are doing.
§bI Know What I Am Doing - Skip
message.voicechat.onboarding.skip.title: §bSkip Setup
message.voicechat.onboarding.skip.descri:
§eAre you sure you want to skip this setup guide?

§eIf you skip it, you will have to adjust all the settings manually!
message.voicechat.onboarding.speaker: §aSelect Speaker
message.voicechat.onboarding.activation: §fPlease choose the method to activate your microphone.
§fWhen selecting %s, you need to press and hold a button to speak.
§f%s automatically activates your microphone when a certain volume threshold is reached.
message.voicechat.onboarding.ptt.title: §cChoose Push to Talk Keybind
message.voicechat.onboarding.ptt.descrip: §fPlease choose the key that should be used to activate your microphone.
message.voicechat.onboarding.voice.title: §fAdjust Microphone Activation Threshold
message.voicechat.onboarding.voice.descr: §dEnable microphone testing and make sure the volume is below the slider when you are silent and above it when you are speaking.
message.voicechat.onboarding.final.descr:
§a§lYou have successfully configured your voice chat!

Open the voice chat menu with %s.
§fHold %s while speaking to use the voice chat.
§e§lYou will be muted after exiting this screen. Press %s to unmute.

§e§lYou can always change all the settings in the voice chat menu.
Keybinds, however, can be changed just like any other keybind in the game.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.recording_:
§fThe location where recordings should be saved.
§fLeave blank to use the default location.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.run_local_: §fIf the voice chat should work in singleplayer or in worlds shared over LAN.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.offline_pl: §fIf the volume adjustment interface should also display offline players.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.freecam_mo:
§bHow listening to other players should work when using freecam mods.
§dCAMERA: You will hear the voice chat around your camera. Whether you will still be able to hear the voice chat when the camera is far away from your character depends on the voice chat broadcast range of the server.
PLAYER: You will hear the voice chat around your character no matter where your camera is.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.mute_on_jo: §eIf enabled, you will be automatically muted when joining a world.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.audio_pack:
The maximum number of audio packets that should be held back if a packet arrives out of order or is dropped.
This prevents audio packets that are only slightly out of order from being discarded.
Set this to 0 to disable.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.voice_deac:
The time it takes for the microphone to deactivate when using voice activation.
A value of 1 means 20 milliseconds, 2=40 ms, 3=60 ms, and so on.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.output_buf:
The size of the audio output buffer (in packets).
Higher values mean a higher latency but less crackling.
Increase this value if you have an unstable internet connection.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.hud_icon_s: The scale of the icons in the voice chat HUD, such as microphone or connection status.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.hud_icon_p:
The X position of the icons in the voice chat HUD.
Negative values mean anchoring to the right instead.

The Y position of the icons in the voice chat HUD.
Negative values mean anchoring to the bottom instead.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.group_play: §fThe orientation of the player icons in the group chat HUD.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.group_hud_: The scale of the player icons in the group chat HUD.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.group_play:
The X position of the player icons in the group chat HUD.
Negative values mean anchoring to the right instead.

The Y position of the player icons in the group chat HUD.
Negative values mean anchoring to the bottom instead.
cloth_config.voicechat.config.show_own_g: §fShow yourself in the group chat HUD
If your own player icon should be displayed in the group chat HUD when you are in a group.
